hotels.title: Spain Five-Star Oceanfront Luxury in the Heart of Costa Brava
hotels.description: Escape to the sun-kissed Costa Brava for a luxurious stay at Hostal de La Gavina, an elegant private estate sandwiched between pristine beaches and rolling waves at the tip of a picturesque peninsula. Featuring a collection of beautifully appointed rooms and suites offering blissful garden and ocean views, this Spanish sanctuary is the epitome of opulence - confirmed by its status as a Leading Hotels of the World member. Swing into your stay with a hit on the tennis court, choose from a range of beauty treatments at the lavish spa with hammam and hot tub, or take in the lovely landscaped gardens and sweeping ocean views from the outdoor pool. Spend days strolling the beautiful Costa Brava, filling your time with visits to Salvador Dalí House Museum, the stunning Cathedral of Girona or tranquil Jardins de Santa Clotilde. When it's time to dine, head back to the hotel and enjoy a snack at the poolside Garbí restaurant or dinner at the romantic Candlelight, featuring an intimate terrace. Located only 100 metres from the gorgeous shores of S'Agaro Beach, this oceanfront oasis has everything you need for a relaxing stay.
